actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue code of 1954 to provide for individuals a 20-percent maximum rate of income tax for certain amounts of dividends from common stock of domestic corporations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to limit to 20 percent the income tax rate on common stock dividend income under $2,000 of individuals earning less that $50,000 a year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue code of 1954 to provide for individuals a 20-percent maximum rate of income tax for certain amounts of dividends from common stock of domestic corporations.
